page.title: 03ENTERTAINMENT/TRANSPORT
page.content:
There isn't much entertainment in our area.There is sometimes the odd play or two in halls and churches,and sometimes school's have plays.But mainly the people in the area stay and watch television.Some people may go round friends and have their own entertaining evening.Annually in our area there are summer fetes,and football matches that you can go and watch. By Spencer Cannon
It is quite easy to get about;there is a regular bus service in the area and a train service,which would take you to any place in the Brighton area. The standard charge in a taxi is eighty pence,and ten pence for every five-hundred yards. By Shane Hills
